content.detailedDescription: It was about 5:30 in the evening, overcast, had been drizzling.  i was washing dishes and looked out kitchen window.  i saw cat sitting on top of fencepost and thought it looked cute.  went out to take picture of him.  pictures kept coming out blurry.  took about 5 and gave up.  it wasn't until i downloaded them onto my computer that i found one in focus, and saw lights.  clearly the object was circling the cat in a clockwise direction.  he is looking to his left, which is where he heard it.  it's lights or radiation are reflecting in the cat's eyes.
content.summary: Cat was sitting on fence post, watching something very quick.  took multiple pictures, all blurry except one.  it showed object circling cat, casting light that reflected in cat's eyes.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting with family when we witnessed a bright starlike object appear over fields and houses across from us. we are used to seeing aircraft as their is a flightpath to the major airport. this craft made no noise even though it was quiet. i presumed it was a satellite or the spacestation but as it got closer it was obvious the object was in earths atmosphere. it slowed for awhile and then deviated away getting brighter and then it just disappeared. on checking the end of my video footage on the second one it appears disc like.
content.summary: Bright star like object followed route but slowed then turned and got brighter then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my dog, the sun had set and it was dusk. out of the corner of my eye i saw this huge flaming object that at first i though was a plane on fire crashing to the ground, but the shape wasn't consistent and was traveling very fast so i thought maybe it was a meteorite. the object slowed to a hault as it descended. it changed shape from a solid fuzzy orb with flaming wings to a pulsating transparent orb without wings. the orb hovered for about 5 to 10 minutes flickering, growing and shrinking, sometimes making quick but short jutting motions. it looked like there was a centre sphere of bright white light surrounded by a pulsating transparent dome/sphere that was predominantly red/orange/yellow. it could have flashed a blue/green colour but so quick it was barely noticeable. it then began to fade in and out until it completely vanished. it made no sound whatsoever nor did it leave a trail of smoke or debris. it left me feeling confused to what it could be, it didn't seem to act like a weather balloon or lantern. it was the flaming wings that through me off, they appeared to be solid object attached to the orb but then appeared to be plumes of propelant or something resembling a jet stream. by the time i had pulled my phone out to record a video of the object it had stopped descending and began hovering. i had noticed a few neighbours were outside and had seen it too. (their reaction in the attached video contains profain language).
content.summary: Glowing orb with flaming wings, hovered and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in my alley waiting (this was in 1998) on my cousin looking east, when something made me turn and look up into the sky(southwest), like if they wanted me to see...At first i saw red and blue lights blinking, and i thought it was a plane, but as i took a closer look it was a huge, i mean huge ufo and the lights were rotating around it so fast it looked like they were blinking but they were actually going around it round and round. the craft was tilted to one side slightly and it remained in that position as it slowly, i mean very slowly flew into the horizon over to the pacific ocean. that's when i knew they existed.
content.summary: Ufo literally called for my attention and made my head turn to the sky and look at it, i first thought it was a plane but when i looked closer it was a huge ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck smoking a cigarette watching a star i normally do at night, i noticed a dim light moving slowly in the sky and though nothing of it until like a flare became brighter than the north star, almost like a spotlight. it dimmed down again and became brighter again and again. it's movement speed was changing as well. at one point it stopped moving and i knew it wasn't anything man made, after it continued moving it dimmed until o could no longer see it. i went inside to call my dad to tell him and shortly after went back outside to carefully watch the skies, the same object then came from the direction it went back to where i first saw it, then turned around and did a zig zag flight path into the milky way and dissapeared again. my girlfriend was with me the first time but could barely even see the stars without her glasses and i didn't even think to grab my phone the first or second time. i was terrified and excited at the same time. it looked very far out in the atmosphere. the universe is as we know infinite, we cannot be the only life forms in existence.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started dim, became brighter than north star, pulsed between the two. then dissapeared, saw again. zig zagged flight

content.detailedDescription: My wife valentina, and our neighbor chris, were sitting in our rooftop garden on july 30th, 2016, at approximately 1:15am, when chris first noticed an unusually luminous object crossing the sky. our roof has an unobstructed view of most of southern manhattan as far north as midtown. the object was observed by all three of us approaching from the sw, just left of the world trade center, heading on a straight course ne, and completely disappearing in an instant just south of the kosciuzsko bridge (from our viewpoint). being accustom to many planes, helicopters and commercial drones regularly flying overhead, we quickly came to realize this was something very unusual and out of he ordinary. it's size, color and velocity, in addition to being completely silent, was unlike anything else we have ever seen. as we watched the object continue to approach, we kept questioning what else it could be. ultimately, we were left in a state of shock and excitement as we witnessed it disappear instantly amonget a completely clear patch of sky. had it not been for this odd disappearing act, we would have likely written this sighting off. while it is difficult to say what it was exactly, it was most definitely not a plane, helicopter, drone, firework, missle/rocket, meteor or satellite. please feel free to contact me with any other questions if you like.
content.summary: Noticed an unusual pulsating orange orb approach from the sw and continue overhead in ne direction. object was luminous and silent. while there were clouds in the sky, the object was witnessed disappearing suddenly in a clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at 7000 south and redwood, in my dates car, heading home. my date noticed these two lights just standing still. at first i thought it was a plane. but the lights weren't moving, just standing very still. as we got closer, between the two bright, white lights was a cylinder shaped figure. it turned into a glowy purple, and than slowly turned red, than blue. as we passed i looked behind me to watch. than it slowly started moving towards the northern side of utah while changing into the three colors. than i looked away. i felt very excited and shocked. i couldn't believe my own eyes. before i had spotted the ufo i was a bit tired. during, i was confused and a bit scared.
content.summary: At first it was two bright lights up in the sky standing still. the cylinder in middle of the 2 lights turned purple, than red than blue. and it stayed for under 1 minute than started its path north of utah.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for ursa major for my wifes iphone app for finding stars and constellations. i had just found the constillation and from my left, a bright light...........Looking like a flaming torch ball came down from on high, traveling south west to northwest. i watched for about 10 secs, noticing a black shape forming in front of the flames. it started out as a ballish form, then morphed into a geodesic form, kind of a parallelogram, then into total flame and disappeard behind the horizon and out of sight.
content.summary: Flaming ball from the south west, crossed the sky and horizon from south to north, flaming object had a boxlike entity in the middle of the flames.........

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a park under a tree at about 3:00am when i saw a orb of orange light float through the sky. it was moving very slow and its path was straight but seemed to tilt doqn towards the ground like it was wanting to land. the incident lasted only about 3 minutes but i just had a feeling it wasnt from here what so ever.
content.summary: Ufo seemed to "float" across the sky but was to slow and to close to be anything that i know of.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, taking a smoke break in my car at around 10pm est in columbus, ohio. i reclined my seat and was staring at the night sky and was staring at what i thought was a star, until it started moving left to right, up and down, making very random turns at a really high speed. it stayed in the same general area in the sky and kept disappearing and reappearing. this went on for approximately 40 minutes. i ran inside to round up my coworkers to have a look, and they both saw it as well.
content.summary: Disappearing and reappearing. moving sporadically and quickly in a rather small area in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving in slow traffic when i noticed a very strange cloud unlike i had ever seen before. i took some pictures of it with my smart phone and then later, while showing them to my wife, zoomed in on the cloud to get a better look at it and that's when i saw the 2 objects. my boss jesse was with me and saw the cloud and we both had a very odd feeling about it. i showed him the pictures and zoomed in for him to see and he was amazed. i don't know what the objects are but that was the strangest cloud i'd ever seen and felt as if though the two were connected. i could not see the objects until i zoomed in on the pictures so i don't know what they were actually doing, but i do believe they were a type of ufo.
content.summary: Saw a very strange cloud and took pictures. zoomed in and then saw objects

content.detailedDescription: Was looking over photos from a concert and saw strange lights over a building in chicago
content.summary: Found while looking over pictures from lollapalooza, didn't see in real time only saw it in pictures

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on our back porch (which has a view for several miles over the hudson river), i noticed that a red light in the distance (which i had originally thought was an airplane) had stopped suddenly and was hovering.  i immediately pointed it out to my wife, and as i watched it appeared to "rotate" as the light changed from red to green, and then back to red.  it then started moving again, instantaneously accelerating back to the previous airplane-like speed, moving for a few seconds before again freezing, hovering, and changing from red to green and back to red.  then it changed directions and flew back the way it had come from, until it was out of sight.  

we have regular airplane and helicopter traffic that we can see, but this object moved at least as fast as the airplanes we see, and stopped and accelerated much faster than any helicopter i have seen.  that being said, it was at night and the object had to have been over a mile away, making it impossible for me to see anything other than the light it was emitting.
content.summary: Lighted object moving fast, stopping suddenly and changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: I parked my truck on the north end of lake leelanau on july 3, to watch the fire works in leland.I saw the space station pass overhead and then i saw a light,smaller than the space station, moving through the sky....I watched it move around the sky in different directions..I saw 6 such lights moving around the night sky at the lake...Then they were not so visible and i drove to my home about a mile away,and observed 2 more in the sky...Then they were gone from sight.
content.summary: Lights similer to a star or sattilite...But changing direction not on a straight course,like the space station

content.detailedDescription: As reported to asd in person by the witness, who is retired military, who wishes to remain anonymous and would not provide a phone number so i used mine. the witness and his three young children ages 13, 11 and 6 were on vacation in sunrise beach, mo in approximately 1969 (exact date unknown)in july. the witness took his children to a local motel and then to some kind of event. upon arrival at the motel, which is no longer there, they were given a key to a room at the end of the building which was a one-story building. the family noticed that there was a group of people in the picnic area and children on the swings. the people were all dressed in 1900's clothing and they were not speaking or making any noise at all. this family looked over at the witness and his kids, just staring at them, which made the witness nervous. there was also a man sitting in a chair right next to the door of the witness's motel room, which the witness found odd. they said hello, but the man ignored them. a couple of hours later they left the motel to go to the event, and all of the people were gone. he stopped in the office and asked who the people were and the clerk said that no one else was staying there at the time and there shouldn't have been anyone else on the site. the witness and his three kids then left for dinner and the event, which i believe was a rodeo. they drove back to the motel late at 10:30 pm at night, and as they drove along noticed a craft hovering on the side of the road, the craft then moved very slowly over their vehicle. the witness did not intend to stop the car as he was afraid, but the car stopped on its own. the craft, which was a dark metallic gray color and a disk shape approximately 60' in diameter, had white and red lights on the bottom of it. the red light shined a beam inside the vehicle, lighting up the interior of the car with a red glow. the boys were yelling, yet the youngest child, a girl, did not wake up the entire time. then the oldest boy stuck his head outside the window to look up at the craft and got a good look at it. the craft then moved on very slowly and out of sight at the treeline. the witness said that the craft was only about 20-30 feet above their car and it had no noise. he thought they had missing time as well. when they returned to the motel room they all went to sleep and slept through to the next evening. when they woke up they were all disoriented and did not immediately remember the incident, but they gradually did remember it over the next couple of hours and it concerned all of them. no photos were taken. i am reporting this now because it should be on record.
content.summary: Huge ufo right over vehicle and missing time

content.detailedDescription: Im not sure but i think the occupants is trying to communicate with me.By the way im disabled im a stroke victim i hear somewhat melodic sounds from the occupant but i dont see any mouth im feeling confused during the time im so scared duuno why. i dont feel threatned or anything as if they wanted me to be involved in their plan or something. i was in bed get up to pee in the middle of the night in the bathroom i looked outside the bathroom window then confusion happened i felt disorganizes and helpless. these occupants are good to me/ they pointed one of their body part towards me. eyes are dull when they looked at me teary eyed. i feel i was loved by them.  i have feeling that they will see me again
content.summary: Im not sure but the occupant i think is trying to communicate with me after the ecounter i had a dream  of the occupant telling me ??????

content.detailedDescription: The time it started was around 11:36. we had just come from dinner with a couple of good friends. we were in vienna, austria when it happened and i was pretty surprised to see so many stars for a city's night sky. a few minutes later, we saw a strange, small light going at pretty incredible speeds for a spacecraft. first we thought it was a satellite or an airplane but then it started making curves along the way towards the south east. after a few minutes, my friends went back inside the house (we were staying with them) but i decided to stay a little longer to see what was going to happen with the spacecraft. after a few seconds, out of a sudden the object started shaking around wildly in all directions with a brighter light than before and then the object just disappeared like that. a few seconds later, i just stood there staring into the night sky without really any sort of emotion. it was as if nothing at all happened. after the event, i was still not as petrified as i thought i would be in this sort of event.
content.summary: Small but fast light seen in night sky, emitting barely any light, starts at the north west then slowly descends diagnolly towards the south east

content.detailedDescription: I was in sixth or seventh grade at the time, and was camping with my dad. i was walking around the camp site around 10 or 11pm. i kept looking up at the sky, because being so far away from the city is rare for me, and i don't usually get to see so many stars. i stopped and was looking up for a long while, and i stared at a group of three stars, or what i athought were stars. then the stars began to slowly start spinning in place. i thought i was seeing things, so i i closed my eyes and looked again, but it still was happening. it spun very, very slowly for about two minutes, then it just dashed off faster than any plane could fly. when it was gone i froze for a minute, in disbelief. then i ran back to my camp site, and quickly explained the whole thing to my dad. he thought i was either making it up, or had just seen a strange plane plane! i know for a fact that i saw it. i'll remember it forever.
content.summary: I thought it was a constellation origionally. then it turned in place, and suddenly zoomed off into the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my house to get some fresh air and look at the stars at approximately 10:05pm. i looked up and saw a bright sphere-like object, initially thinking it was a star as it had a twinkly sort of light at first. i noticed it began to move across the sky. i watched it to make sure it was moving and then asked my friend to come outside and take a look at it. we both saw it moving from the southwest to the northwest in a straight line. as it did this, the entire object seemed to dim and brighten, but not a patterned or organized way. it did not seem to have a "rhythm" to its dimming and brightening. it flew out of view within minutes. 
standing out there after the object was gone minutes later, i saw two separate planes flying in different directions. the planes' blinking and flashing lights contrasted starkly with the glowing and dimming of the other object that i saw that night.
content.summary: I saw a glowing sphere-like object that somewhat randomly brightened and dimmed move across the sky late at night.

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping at the whispering pines campground. wednesday/thursday morning i saw a sphere that resembled the diatom-looking object as seen during the space shuttle columbia's broken tether in 1996. i noticed it because it was bright and seemed to descend, then stop. it descended again and stopped again. i looked to see if it gone left or right but it was gone. the object featured no blinking lights, just glowed pinkish white. it was pulsing regularly the whole time. we had seen falling stars earlier that night and this was no falling star. i doubt space junk starts and stops in descent. i lost sight of it as it fell beneath the horizon.
it was a spectacularly clear evening that night.
i have always watched the skies and now i feel i have finally seen a ufo.
content.summary: Circle pulsed but did not blink. descended in three controlled increments.

content.detailedDescription: I walked by my kitchen window and saw hugh lighted clouds with no thunder so i got my camera to take pics of that cause i never saw it before, it did look like really cool since i do love the clouds and skies. then as i was recording the light flashes a star like thing appeared out of no where, stayed there in place and it was very quite all around outside even in that video but then it whipped to the left of my screen and then moments later came back and disappeared into thin air, just like it appeared.  kinda scared me or should i say shocked me so i turned off the camera and took a step back in the house.... then i said oh just go see if it happens again and so i went back on the porch and recorded, but it looked just dark and then i came in and uploaded it and the second recording showed a funnel like thing going left to right over and over and made so much noise and static on the recording , but i did not hear anything or see anything while recording. unlike the first recording that i did visually see it happen.  it was very bizzare and i needed to tell somebody and i posted them and felt the need to report it because it was something un-explainable.
content.summary: White orb appeared from nowhere then left and there was a funnel going left to right and make my camera all static and noisy but it wasn't outside

content.detailedDescription: We saw a single light, then a solid light... we followed with our car. we say rotating lights around the machine (saucer). the lights were white. it hovered above us. there were four colored lights on the bottom. it flew away- i think it was magnetic... we did not hear a sound.
content.summary: We saw a single light, then a solid light... we followed with our car. we say rotating lights around the machine (saucer). the lights were white. it hovered above us. there were four colored lights on the bottom. it flew away- i think it was magnetic...

content.detailedDescription:
on the night of july 23 2016 i went outside of my home in brantford on canada and proceeded to take photos of the moon.Something i do regularly .
 at approx 12:00 am (sse direction) i noticed a flash above the moon,it was a quick on /off 'type' of a light. the light flash was quick enough for me to question whether i had indeed seen it.
i thought the best idea was to see if the camera could perhaps 'catch' it as i had expected it to happen again, possibly revealing a satellite. by the time i had my camera set to shoot i realized it was visible to the naked eye at the approx. the 1 o'clock position it appeared as a star or possible planet in the distance. this piqued my curiosity greatly and i considered what planets ,stars etc and could think of none. i did note there was no other activity in the sky.
 i proceed to take several pictures and was noticing it was changing positions but i did not witness movement. many of the pictures were out of focus but i was able to capture some that were clear.
 describing the object was difficult as i found it did not fit into the 'standard catergory' ufo, that most witness.It had an almost patina green body,the under carriage appearing copperish and a visible through the camera lens sectioning in 3 spots. i was completely amazed at the size.
 a tripod was not used,i was shaking and my heart was racing while trying to take photos wondering if it was all truly happening as well who was going to believe this besides mufon !
 i suddenly felt 'vulnerable' and went in the house to review the photos.
 i did not sleep much that night or any night since mostly a feeling of amazement.
content.summary: 10 minute encounter with an object above the moon july 23 2016 12:07am -12:12 am

content.detailedDescription:
1. parking spot discounter
2. after i take the photo
3. surprise, when i take a look on the photo. i want to make a photo about the moon.

4. i only see the object on my photo

5. it was a big surprise

6. i dont know
content.summary: Glowing green cigar or cylinder

content.detailedDescription: I was texting and noticing an hour gone by and my fiance sent me texts and they just popped up no memory of me recieving a notification i then notice a light amd another 30 minutes passed unnoticed. and then the light took off from a stationary position. it went from 0 to passed 300 mph in a matter of a second and was gone. i then began to feel sick and dizzy. i have no recollection of the lost time.
content.summary: I was texting and noticing an hour gone by and my fiance sent me texts and they just popped up no memory of me recieving a notification i then notice a light amd another 30 minutes passed unnoticed. and then the light took off from a stationary position

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were on the balcony of two story home and saw a huge round ship like structure tilted at an angle in sky. was the size of football field and four lights came from opposite directions at the same time and all landed on it. the lights on it looked like windows resembled building structure or the way a cruise ship would look in ocean but it was in sky like a city. it was so huge we thought it was the end of the world. we had binoculars so saw it up close. i said out loud you can not show yourself like this everyone will not be able to handle this. my friend then said look it's pulling away it's like it hears you. it slowly pulled back into a mist or clouds until it disappeared. the next day we checked the newspaper and my friend could not believe we were the only ones who had observed it.
content.summary: Me and one other person on balcony with binoculars so saw up huge ship building like structure slanted or tilted with tiny lights like windows. four lights all came from opposite directions landed on it at same time and it slowly pulled back and away.Huge

content.detailedDescription:
At home, wife & i working in back yard painting outbuildings. as i was painting the top edge of the east wall of the storage shed, this orb
caught my attention. i watched it for about a couple minutes then went over to my wife who was doing trim work around the garage windows.I
pointed out the object to her. as she was observing the orb,i went into the house to get my binoculars, ( 7x50 ).  we could then see the colors and color changes.  it went from bright blue to white then to red-orange.
the color sequence repeated during the whole time period. roughly about
a half hour elapsed and a 4 engine jet aircraft which looked to be all white with no markings and possibly no windows as on a commercial craft
flew in an arc from east to south. the orb was quite a distance away
in the north west sky with no sound. the aircraft was fairly low about
( a guestimate ) 5,000 feet. there was also no sound or vapor trails
from the aircraft. the sighting of the plane was brief.

the orb when first sighted was in the north west sky.  there were some clouds but  it was overall clear and bright.  from the first sighting point in the north west, the orb very slowly moved to the west, stayed
at that position, distance unknown, came back to its starting point,
stayed there, stayed at that position then moved slowly again to the
north east. again it stayed at that position. with the few clouds in the sky, the orb stayed out of the clouds.  i can't give you the duration of
each stop position as i'm not sure but the timeline of observation was from 11:15 a.M to 1:02 p.M. 

as for feelings/reactions, everything was normal.  we did let a visitor
observe use the binoculars and i asked her what she was viewing and she verified our findings. 

i went in for a lunch at approximately 12:40 p.M and went back at 1:02
p.M. to once again observe the orb and it was gone.

i have no additional evidence or film footage/photos.

the times submitted are exact.
content.summary: Sighted at 11:15 a.M. july 20. 2016.Watched slow pattern of orb with a 3 color change.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out to use the restroom. we walked around the front of the condo. i always like to look up at the stars. i saw a shooting star and it seemed that after words a star that was shining went bright and out. i kept looking at that spot but couldn't see a star shining. i started to scan the sky again and saw the yellow orange light.  i've been taught to look for a blinking light but couldn't see one. as i watched i noticed an airplane or a jet flying in the nw direction.  the airplane made a noise but i could not hear a noise from the light.  i kept watching it as it seemed to move towards me but as i watched still no sound.  i've seen them before. but thought i would report because of the airplane.
content.summary: Yellow orange light orb ball.  i have seen them before.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello i have reported a close encounter previously, case file idk. i must mention that i was disappointed @ how the story was wrote & i'd like a re- write of said story. in doing so i will share a photo of said craft that i was previously unaware to have in my possession. 

the story is factual & the photo is of the craft up close & is also the same as what left behind a crop circle that was indeed deemed to be authentic. the name of the person who took this particular case escapes me, but like i said.. if you re write the article for me i will send the close-up of said disk& picture of related crop circle... i'm located in east tennessee & would like to corespond with the gentleman who took my info so we may touch base and rewrite that mess... thank you






witnessed a bright, silent silver metallic disk. from the south west moving north east @ tree level. object was silent moving approximately a few miles per hour. after object crossed the street approximately 150 feet away it stopped. silently hovered then in an instant it rose up straight up, proceed to angle itself @ 45 degree angle then instantly flew away @ impossible silent speeds not before i captured a photo and discovered it left a crop circle in madisonville as i have a picture of that as well... drop me a line and i will share my first hand account as well as my pictures as long as this experience is documented correct ly
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: G

content.detailedDescription: After walking my dog sat down on my front step . i saw a bank of red and white lights that did not flash or strobe but just remainde on . first spotted the lights come into sight around a house that sits to the left of mine . set in the center of a horse shoe shaped court . the lights passed in front of me and made a slight turn  to the left to the nw. i saw the light aprox. 1:30 minutes no more than 2 minutes .  i stop observing the object when it pass behind trees . when i first spotted the object i took my cell phone a snapped two or three photos ,  only one showed the object .  i no longer have the photo.  when i change phones for a new one it was gone. i had sent a copy to the ufo magazine  to bill bines ( not sure about last name ) .  i reconstructed the object with a drawing .
content.summary: Alternating red and white lighter lined up in a roll. no flash  nostrobing or flashing ,made slight  turn lights looked the same on both sides seen.
